name: Scribing Table

pages.text: The $(thing)Scribing Table$() is used to rename items. It requires $(thing)Black Dye$() to rename items, which can be supplied as the traditional dye item or as a bucket of dye fluid.
The scribing screen takes text entry at the top, an input on the left, a dye in the center. The output is taken from the right slot.
